snippet: How would you like to chat with a musician? Fish with a mayor? Or dine with a king? New Web sites are helping travelers think far beyond the standard itinerary.
abstract: David Page Practical Traveler column on travel-sharing Web sites that help travelers find more offbeat vacation opportunities.
lead_paragraph: How would you like to chat with a musician? Fish with a mayor? Or dine with a king? New Web sites are helping travelers think far beyond the standard itinerary.

headline.seo: Click Here for an Offbeat Experience
